item.title: Tax season with ledger
item.description: Accounting with ledger 2018-11-27 * Hort Expenses:Haushalt:Kinderbetreuung 529.75 Assets:Postcheck Find all expenses for child care $ ledger -f 2018.ledger reg -P Kinderbetreuung Find all tax relevant donations $ ledger -f 2018.ledger reg -P Expenses and %Tax
